#Text= Main Aang Iroh Jet Katara Momo Sokka Toph Beifong Zuko Antagonists Dai Li Joo Dee Long Feng says : " Minor Ba Sing Se University student Bosco Corncob guy Kuei Longshot Pao Pet shop owner Pong Royal messenger Smellerbee Tycho Various refugees and citizens " Zuko says : " What 's that smell ?

column1: #Text=" Iroh says : " It 's jook .
#Text=I 'm sure you would n't like it .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Actually , it smells delicious .
#Text=I 'd love a bowl , Uncle .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Now that your fever is gone , you seem different somehow .
#Text=" Zuko says : " It 's a new day .
#Text=We 've got a new apartment , new furniture , and today 's the grand opening of your new tea shop .
#Text=Things are looking up , Uncle .
#Text=" Aang says : " You have n't seen your dad in over two years .
#Text=You must be so excited !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I know I should be , but , I just feel sick to my stomach .
#Text=" Aang says : " Do n't be nervous .
#Text=He 's going to be so happy to see you !
#Text=" Sokka says : " So what about you ?
#Text=Are you nervous to meet this guru ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Not at all .
#Text=I 'm ready to master the Avatar State .
#Text=I 'll do whatever it takes .
#Text=See you in a week .
#Text=Yip yip !
#Text=" Water Tribe warrior says : " Sokka , good to see you .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Sokka .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hi , Dad .
#Text=" Kuei says : " Look Bosco !
#Text=The Kyoshi Warriors are here to protect us !
#Text=Are n't you excited ?
#Text=It 's been a difficult week for me .
#Text=My most trusted advisor , Long Feng , and his Dai Li agents tried to take control of Ba Sing Se from me .
#Text=" Azula says : " It 's terrible when you ca n't trust the people who are closest to you .
#Text=" Kuei says : " But there is good news .
#Text=As we speak , the Council of Five is meeting to plan an invasion of the Fire Nation this summer , on the day of a solar eclipse .
#Text=" Azula says : " Really ?
#Text=Now that sounds like a fascinating and brilliant plan .
#Text="
